name: Signature Korean Chicken Pizza
description: K-Pop your tastebuds with hot buldak sauce, flavourful chicken chunks, onion, capsicum, tomato, mozzarella and liquid cheese!

name: Signature Korean Paneer Pizza
description: Transport yourself to K-Town with this thrilling combination of buldak sauce, spicy paneer chunks, onion, capsicum, tomato, mozzarella and liquid cheese!

name: 2 Medium Veg Pizza
description: If pizza equals happiness, then don not just stop at 1. Double your happiness with this combo of 2 medium veg pizzas loaded with cheese and your fave toppings.

name: 1 Medium Veg & 1 Non Veg Pizza
description: We got you the best of both worlds in this one combo. 1 loaded veg pizza for the veggie lovers and another chicken loaded for the chicken lovers that is what you call a perfect ceasefire!

name: 3 Medium Veg Pizza
description: How many pizzas are too many Not three, certainly, because we got you this mouth-watering combo of 3 medium veg pizzas, just in case you feel like partying with your troop.

name: 4 Regular Veg or non veg Pizza at 649
description: How many pizzas are too many Not three, certainly, because we got you this mouth-watering combo of 3 medium veg pizzas, just in case you feel like partying with your troop.

name: Tandoori Paneer Tikka Pizza + Cheesy Garlic Bread
description: A delicious, flavour packed combo of Tandoori Paneer Tikka Medium Pizza and Cheesy Garlic Bread. (Energy: 1543KCal, Carbohydrates: 162gm, Proteins: 62gm, Fats: 68gm, Sodium: 3523mg)

name: Gluten Free Corn Cheese Steam Momo
description: Serves 1 | Sweet corn and creamy cheese blended with colorful peppers and spices, wrapped in gluten-free dough made with quinoa and chickpeas. Lower in calories, higher in protein. Served with spicy red sauce. [5 pcs] Calories: 226.98 | Protein: 9.40g per 100g. (Serves 1).

name: Gluten Free Corn Cheese Chilli Momo
description: Serves 1 | Sweet corn and cheese wrapped in gluten-free dough made with quinoa and chickpeas. Lower in calories, higher in protein. Stir-fried in a hot and spicy chili sauce. [5 pcs] Calories: 226.98 | Protein: 9.40g per 100g. (Serves 1).

name: Gluten Free Chicken Darjeeling Steam Momo
description: Serves 1 | Soft, juicy boneless chicken mixed with onion, coriander, and spices, wrapped in gluten-free dough made with quinoa and chickpeas. Lower in calories, higher in protein. Served with spicy Darjeeling sauce. [5 pcs] Calories: 273.22 | Protein: 11.13g per 100g. (Serves 1).

name: Gluten Free Chicken Cheese Steam Momo
description: Serves 1 | Shredded chicken infused with spices and wrapped in gluten-free dough made with quinoa and chickpeas. Lower in calories, higher in protein. Served with a spicy red sauce. [5 pcs] Calories: 246.85 | Protein: 10.96g per 100g. (Serves 1).

name: Classic Veggie Burger
description: A delicious veggie patty made with fresh vegetables, herbs, and spices, served in a soft bun with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
serving_suggestion: Serve with french fries and a cold drink.

name: Chicken Cheese Burger
description: Juicy grilled chicken patty topped with melted cheese, crispy lettuce, and tangy sauce in a toasted bun.
serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with onion rings and a milkshake.

name: Spicy Beef Burger
description: A flame-grilled beef patty with jalapeños, spicy sauce, and cheese for a fiery kick.
serving_suggestion: Best with coleslaw and a chilled beer.

name: Fish Burger
description: Crispy fried fish fillet with tartar sauce, lettuce, and pickles in a sesame bun.
serving_suggestion: Serve with lemon wedges and fries.

name: Double Chicken Burger
description: Two juicy chicken patties with double cheese, bacon, and special sauce.
serving_suggestion: Best with loaded fries and a soft drink.

french_fries_varieties.name: Classic French Fries
french_fries_varieties.description: Crispy golden fries made from fresh potatoes, lightly salted for the perfect taste.
french_fries_varieties.serving_suggestion: Serve hot with ketchup or mayonnaise.

french_fries_varieties.name: Bacon & Cheese Fries
french_fries_varieties.description: Loaded fries with crispy bacon bits, melted cheese, and a drizzle of ranch.

french_fries_varieties.name: Truffle Fries
french_fries_varieties.description: Gourmet fries tossed in truffle oil and garnished with parmesan and herbs.

french_fries_varieties.name: Egg & Sausage Fries
french_fries_varieties.description: Loaded fries topped with scrambled eggs, sausage, and a dash of hot sauce.

french_fries_varieties.name: BBQ Pulled Pork Fries
french_fries_varieties.description: Fries loaded with tender BBQ pulled pork and coleslaw.

noodles.name: Schezwan Noodles
noodles.description: Spicy and tangy noodles cooked with Schezwan sauce, bell peppers, and carrots for a fiery flavor.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Pair with a cooling cucumber salad.

noodles.name: Prawn Noodles
noodles.description: Delicious stir-fried noodles with succulent prawns, garlic, and vegetables in a light soy-based sauce.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Garnish with fresh cilantro and lime.

noodles.name: Garlic Noodles
noodles.description: Buttery noodles tossed with garlic, herbs, and a hint of chili for a flavorful experience.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Great as a side dish or with grilled vegetables.

noodles.name: Beef Noodles
noodles.description: Hearty noodles with tender beef strips, mushrooms, and bok choy in a rich broth.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Serve hot with a side of chili paste.

noodles.name: Thai Green Curry Noodles
noodles.description: Rice noodles in a creamy green curry sauce with coconut milk, tofu, and vegetables.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Garnish with fresh basil and lime wedges.

noodles.name: Egg Noodles
noodles.description: Classic egg noodles stir-fried with vegetables and a touch of oyster sauce for a rich taste.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Best served with a fried egg on top.

noodles.name: Miso Ramen
noodles.description: Japanese ramen noodles in a savory miso broth with tofu, corn, and seaweed.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Top with sesame seeds and chili oil.

noodles.name: Spicy Pork Noodles
noodles.description: Chewy noodles with spicy minced pork, garlic, and chili oil for a bold flavor.
noodles.serving_suggestion: Sprinkle crushed peanuts for extra crunch.

dosas.name: Masala Dosa
dosas.description: A crispy rice crepe stuffed with spiced potato filling, served with coconut chutney and sambar.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Serve hot with coconut chutney and sambar.

dosas.name: Onion Uttapam
dosas.description: A thick, fluffy pancake made from fermented rice and lentil batter, topped with onions, tomatoes, and green chilies.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with coconut chutney or tomato chutney.

dosas.name: Chicken Dosa
dosas.description: A crispy dosa filled with spicy shredded chicken, served with mint chutney and sambar.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Serve hot with mint chutney and sambar.

dosas.name: Rava Dosa
dosas.description: A crispy, lacy dosa made with semolina, rice flour, and spices, cooked to perfection.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Best served with coconut chutney and tomato chutney.

dosas.name: Egg Dosa
dosas.description: A thin, crispy dosa topped with a beaten egg and spices, cooked until golden.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Serve hot with tomato chutney or garlic chutney.

dosas.name: Pesarattu (Green Gram Dosa)
dosas.description: A nutritious dosa made from green gram (moong dal) batter, flavored with ginger and green chilies.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Traditionally served with upma and ginger chutney.

dosas.name: Mutton Keema Dosa
dosas.description: A flavorful dosa stuffed with spicy minced mutton, served with onion chutney.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with coconut chutney or onion chutney.

dosas.name: Paper Dosa
dosas.description: An extra-thin and crispy dosa, served plain or with a side of potato masala.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

dosas.name: Cheese Dosa
dosas.description: A dosa stuffed with grated cheese and optionally mixed with vegetables or spices.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Best served with tomato ketchup or mint chutney.

dosas.name: Prawn Dosa
dosas.description: A coastal-style dosa stuffed with spicy prawn masala, served with coconut chutney.
dosas.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with coconut chutney and lime pickle.

indian_desserts.name: Gulab Jamun
indian_desserts.description: Soft, deep-fried dough balls soaked in sugar syrup, flavored with cardamom and rose water.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.

indian_desserts.name: Rasgulla
indian_desserts.description: Spongy cottage cheese balls soaked in light sugar syrup, originating from West Bengal.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Serve chilled with a sprinkle of saffron.

indian_desserts.name: Jalebi
indian_desserts.description: Crispy, coiled sweet made from fermented batter, deep-fried and soaked in sugar syrup.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Best served hot with rabri or milk.

indian_desserts.name: Barfi
indian_desserts.description: A dense, sweet confection made from condensed milk, sugar, and flavors like coconut or pistachio.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Cut into squares and garnish with silver leaf.

indian_desserts.name: Ladoo
indian_desserts.description: Round sweet balls made from flour, ghee, and sugar, often flavored with nuts.

indian_desserts.name: Rasmalai
indian_desserts.description: Soft cottage cheese patties soaked in sweetened, thickened milk flavored with cardamom.

indian_desserts.name: Kheer
indian_desserts.description: A creamy rice pudding made with milk, sugar, and flavored with cardamom and nuts.

indian_desserts.name: Halwa
indian_desserts.description: A dense, sweet pudding made from semolina, carrots, or lentils, cooked in ghee.

indian_desserts.name: Sandesh
indian_desserts.description: A Bengali sweet made from chhena and sugar, often flavored with cardamom or saffron.

indian_desserts.name: Peda
indian_desserts.description: Small, round milk-based sweets flavored with cardamom and garnished with pistachios.

indian_desserts.name: Malpua
indian_desserts.description: Sweet pancakes soaked in sugar syrup, often served with rabri.

indian_desserts.name: Ghevar
indian_desserts.description: A disc-shaped sweet made from flour and soaked in sugar syrup, popular in Rajasthan.

indian_desserts.name: Balushahi
indian_desserts.description: A flaky, glazed doughnut-like sweet made with maida and deep-fried in ghee.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Serve with tea or as a dessert.

indian_desserts.name: Kaju Katli
indian_desserts.description: Thin, diamond-shaped cashew fudge made with ground cashews and sugar.

indian_desserts.name: Mysore Pak
indian_desserts.description: A rich, ghee-laden sweet made from gram flour and sugar, originating from Karnataka.

indian_desserts.name: Cham Cham
indian_desserts.description: A Bengali sweet made from chhena, soaked in sugar syrup, and coated with coconut.

indian_desserts.name: Moong Dal Halwa
indian_desserts.description: A rich, slow-cooked dessert made from moong dal, ghee, and sugar.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Serve warm with a scoop of ice cream.

indian_desserts.name: Rabri
indian_desserts.description: A thickened, sweetened milk dessert flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts.
indian_desserts.serving_suggestion: Serve chilled with jalebi or malpua.

coffees.name: Espresso
coffees.description: A concentrated coffee beverage brewed by forcing hot water under pressure through finely-ground coffee beans.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Best enjoyed in a small cup (demitasse) as a quick shot.

coffees.name: Cappuccino
coffees.description: An espresso-based coffee drink topped with steamed milk foam, often dusted with cocoa powder.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Best served in a pre-warmed cup, ideally in the morning.

coffees.name: Iced Latte
coffees.description: A chilled coffee drink made with espresso and cold milk, served over ice.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Great for hot days, optionally sweetened with syrup.

coffees.name: Frappuccino
coffees.description: A blended iced coffee drink with milk, ice, and flavored syrups, often topped with whipped cream.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Perfect as a dessert-like beverage, best enjoyed with a straw.

coffees.name: Americano
coffees.description: A diluted espresso with hot water, resembling drip coffee but with a different flavor profile.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Good for those who prefer a milder coffee, can be taken black or with milk.

coffees.name: Turkish Coffee
coffees.description: A traditional method of preparing unfiltered coffee, finely ground and boiled in a special pot (cezve).
coffees.servingSuggestion: Served in small cups with grounds settled at the bottom, often with a sweet.

coffees.name: Cold Brew
coffees.description: Coffee steeped in cold water for 12-24 hours, resulting in a smooth, less acidic flavor.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Best served over ice, optionally with milk or sweetener.

coffees.name: Flat White
coffees.description: An espresso-based drink with microfoam (steamed milk with fine bubbles), stronger than a latte.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Best enjoyed in a small cup, ideal for coffee lovers who prefer a creamy texture.

coffees.name: Mocha
coffees.description: A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, combining espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Great as a dessert coffee, often topped with whipped cream and cocoa powder.

coffees.name: Affogato
coffees.description: A dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.
coffees.servingSuggestion: Best served immediately after pouring espresso to enjoy the contrast of hot and cold.

drinks.name: Mango Lassi
drinks.description: A creamy and refreshing yogurt-based drink blended with ripe mangoes.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled in a tall glass, garnished with a mint leaf.

drinks.name: Masala Chai
drinks.description: Aromatic Indian tea brewed with spices and milk.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve hot in small cups with snacks.

drinks.name: Nimbu Pani
drinks.description: Refreshing lemonade with a hint of salt and spices.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with ice cubes and mint garnish.

drinks.name: Thandai
drinks.description: Traditional cold drink made with milk, nuts and spices, often served during festivals.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled in earthen cups garnished with rose petals.

drinks.name: Jaljeera
drinks.description: Tangy and spicy cumin-flavored drink that aids digestion.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with boondi (fried gram flour balls) on top.

drinks.name: Kokum Sherbet
drinks.description: Sweet and tangy drink made from kokum fruit, popular in western India.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with mint leaves as garnish.

drinks.name: Rose Milk
drinks.description: Sweetened milk flavored with rose syrup.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Badam Milk
drinks.description: Nutritious milk drink with almond flavor.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve warm or chilled garnished with almond slivers.

drinks.name: Sugarcane Juice
drinks.description: Freshly extracted sweet juice from sugarcane, often served with lime and ginger.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve immediately after extraction with ice.

drinks.name: Aam Panna
drinks.description: Cooling raw mango drink that helps prevent heat stroke.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with mint leaves as garnish.

drinks.name: Bael Sherbet
drinks.description: Healthy drink made from wood apple, good for digestion.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with ice cubes.

drinks.name: Kesar Milk
drinks.description: Saffron flavored milk that's rich and aromatic.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve warm garnished with saffron strands.

drinks.name: Paan Sharbat
drinks.description: Refreshing drink inspired by the flavors of paan (betel leaves).
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with gulkand (rose petal jam) swirl.

drinks.name: Sattu Sharbat
drinks.description: Nutritious drink made from roasted gram flour, popular in Bihar and UP.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with mint garnish.

drinks.name: Chandan Sharbat
drinks.description: Cooling drink made with sandalwood powder, perfect for summers.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled in a decorated glass.

drinks.name: Gud ki Chai
drinks.description: Herbal tea sweetened with jaggery instead of sugar.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve hot in kulhad (earthen cup).

drinks.name: Khus Sharbat
drinks.description: Refreshing drink made from vetiver roots with a distinctive earthy flavor.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with mint leaves.

drinks.name: Pudina Sharbat
drinks.description: Cooling mint drink that helps beat the heat.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled with crushed ice.

drinks.name: Rabri Falooda
drinks.description: Rich and creamy dessert drink with vermicelli, basil seeds and rabri.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled in tall glasses with a scoop of ice cream.

drinks.name: Solkadhi
drinks.description: Goan digestive drink made from kokum and coconut milk.
drinks.servingSuggestion: Serve chilled as an appetizer or with meals.

ice_creams.name: Strawberry
ice_creams.description: Refreshing strawberry ice cream made with real fruit.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Garnish with fresh strawberries and mint leaves.

ice_creams.name: Kesar Pista
ice_creams.description: A rich saffron and pistachio flavored ice cream with a creamy texture.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Serve chilled, garnished with chopped pistachios.

ice_creams.name: Mango
ice_creams.description: Delicious mango flavored ice cream made with real mango pulp.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed during summer months, garnish with fresh mango slices.

ice_creams.name: Chocolate
ice_creams.description: Rich and creamy chocolate ice cream made with premium cocoa.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Serve with chocolate syrup and whipped cream.

ice_creams.name: Vanilla
ice_creams.description: Classic vanilla ice cream with a smooth and creamy texture.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Pairs well with pies, cakes or as a standalone dessert.

ice_creams.name: Butterscotch
ice_creams.description: Creamy ice cream with rich butterscotch flavor and caramel swirls.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Top with butterscotch chips and caramel sauce.

ice_creams.name: Tutti Frutti
ice_creams.description: Vanilla ice cream with colorful candied fruit pieces.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Perfect for kids' parties, serve in colorful bowls.

ice_creams.name: Black Currant
ice_creams.description: Tangy and sweet black currant flavored ice cream.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Serve with fresh berries for enhanced flavor.

ice_creams.name: Choco Chips
ice_creams.description: Vanilla ice cream loaded with chocolate chips.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Great for making ice cream sandwiches.

ice_creams.name: Rajbhog
ice_creams.description: Traditional Indian ice cream with saffron, cardamom and dry fruits.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Garnish with silver leaf for a royal presentation.

ice_creams.name: Roasted Almond
ice_creams.description: Creamy ice cream with crunchy roasted almond pieces.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Drizzle with honey for extra sweetness.

ice_creams.name: Paan
ice_creams.description: Unique paan flavored ice cream with gulkand and fennel seeds.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Garnish with edible silver leaf and cherry.

ice_creams.name: Anjeer
ice_creams.description: Fig flavored ice cream with pieces of dried figs.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Serve with fig compote for extra flavor.

ice_creams.name: Kaju Draksh
ice_creams.description: Cashew and raisin flavored ice cream with rich texture.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Garnish with chopped cashews and raisins.

ice_creams.name: Cassata
ice_creams.description: Traditional Italian ice cream with three layers of different flavors.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Slice and serve with fresh fruits.

ice_creams.name: Sitaphal
ice_creams.description: Custard apple flavored ice cream with natural sweetness.

ice_creams.name: Badam Pista
ice_creams.description: Rich almond and pistachio flavored ice cream.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Serve garnished with slivered almonds and pistachios.

ice_creams.name: Litchi
ice_creams.description: Refreshing litchi flavored ice cream with fruity notes.

ice_creams.name: Choco Fudge
ice_creams.description: Chocolate ice cream with rich fudge swirls.
ice_creams.serving_suggestion: Top with hot fudge sauce and whipped cream.

dhokla_varieties.name: Rava Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A quick and easy version of dhokla made with semolina (sooji), steamed to perfection and tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves.

dhokla_varieties.name: Khaman Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A soft and fluffy steamed snack made from gram flour (besan), tempered with mustard seeds, curry leaves, and garnished with fresh coriander and grated coconut.
dhokla_varieties.serving_suggestion: Serve with green chutney and tamarind chutney.

dhokla_varieties.name: Khatta Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A tangy and slightly sour dhokla made with rice and urad dal batter, fermented overnight for a distinct flavor.

dhokla_varieties.name: Mixed Dal Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A nutritious dhokla made with a blend of different lentils, steamed and tempered with spices.
dhokla_varieties.serving_suggestion: Enjoy with sweet and spicy chutney.

dhokla_varieties.name: Besan Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A simple yet delicious dhokla made purely from gram flour, steamed and topped with tempering.

dhokla_varieties.name: Chicken Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A unique non-vegetarian twist to traditional dhokla, made with minced chicken and gram flour, steamed and spiced.
dhokla_varieties.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with mint yogurt dip.

dhokla_varieties.name: Prawn Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A coastal-inspired dhokla made with prawns, gram flour, and coconut, steamed and tempered with curry leaves.

dhokla_varieties.name: Methi Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A healthy and flavorful dhokla made with fenugreek leaves (methi) and gram flour, steamed and lightly spiced.

dhokla_varieties.name: Oats Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A healthy and modern take on dhokla made with oats and gram flour, steamed and served with chutney.

dhokla_varieties.name: Egg Dhokla
dhokla_varieties.description: A protein-rich dhokla made with eggs and gram flour, steamed and tempered with spices.
dhokla_varieties.serving_suggestion: Best enjoyed with spicy garlic chutney.
